review: might not be as techy as neovim or emacs but still a phenomenal ide that is exceptionally intuitive and thorough
still new but already has tons of great features like easy split screen manipulation, in-depth customization, integration with websites like gmail and google calendar, spaces, and arc max
a great note taking system and great for learning markdown (WONDERFUL COMMUNITY PLUGINS LIKE LATEX SUITE)
super customizable terminal app (best feature: cmd-d and cmd-shift-d to make split panels)
super customizable macos keyboard shortcut system that is super easy to use (ai is great at writing the scripts)
